text: The third season of Arthur first aired on November 16, 1998 and ended on January 1, 1999. This is the final season for Michael Caloz to voice D.W. Read because his voiced deepened after this season ended. == Episodes == Episode Name First aired Episode number in season Notes Buster’s Back November 16, 1998 1A First episode of season 3. The Ballad of Buster Baxter November 16, 1998 1B D.W. All Fired Up November 17, 1998 2A I’d Rather Read It Myself November 17, 1998 2B == References == Category:Arthur (TV series) seasons Category:1998 television seasons Category:1999 television seasons
title: Arthur season 3
